noun.description: A mineral of the zeolite group which has the composition KCa(Si₅Al₃)O₁₆.6H₂O, belongs to the monoclinic crystal system, and occurs as colourless, reddish, or yellowish twinned crystals, often forming spherulites or crusts.

origin: Early 19th century. From the name of William Phillips, English mineralogist and geologist + -ite.
